Name: あなたはヒガシチョウチンガニを討ち倒した@{I}You've destroyed an Eastern Angler Crab
Description: 甲殻は粉砕され、輝く突起は静かに横たわっている……@{I}The shell is shattered; the glowing illiciae lie silent...

ChildBranches.Name: 殺して、食肉処理をする@{I}Butcher it
ChildBranches.Description: 物資と、場合によってはその他の珍品のために。@{I}For supplies; and occasionally other oddities.

DefaultEvent.Name: A mis-named beast
DefaultEvent.Description: You are confident, now, that these illiciae - in the seaman's vernacular, 'glowy dangly things' - are nothing of the sort. They quivered in response to your movements: they twitched towards you as if drawn by magnets! Clearly, these are another sense the monster uses. Or perhaps you've just discovered crustacean magnetism..

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered enough, you may learn something...

DefaultEvent.Name: 謎は残る@{I}Mysteries remain
DefaultEvent.Description: うん、血が光ってる。あとは、何もかも酷くべとついてる。ええと……すごいね！@{I}Well, its blood glows. And it's all terribly gooey. Er... fascinating!
